text: The New Adventures of Winnie the Pooh, also referred to as The New Adventures of Pooh, Winnie the Pooh or Pooh for short, is an animated children's television show. It is based on Winnie the Pooh. It was shown from 1988 to 1993. In the opening theme and 1989 and 1991 ending theme (that sounds similar to the opening theme), the Fantasia patch "Fantasia" (that sounds like the Roland D-50 patch "Fantasia") was heard. This show is on Disney Channel in other countries. title: The New Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
